TEXT.TITLE: BANK OF MONTREAL LOWERS CREDIT CARD RATE
TEXT.BODY:
Bank of Montreal said it will reduce the interest rate it charges on outstanding MasterCard balances to 18.3 pct from 21 pct, beginning in July. The bank said it will continue its policy of not charging any annual fee or transaction fees to credit card holders.
Reuter
